sys_remote_update_set.description: Se cambia condici칩n de ejecuci칩n de BR para que solo se consuma el WS de Solman cuando se cierre el incidente We expect ServiceNow only calls this API when an incident is 'Resolved'. So please ask ServiceNow to check their business rule. It should be limited to when the status ' Resolved', not for other statuses.
sys_remote_update_set.name: DVT-HU393-API REST SOLMAN-DIFG-V3

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_78d56a8047040250676de567436d43b9
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.DVT_SolmanLibrary</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Library containing the necessary methods for the connection to solman.</description><name>DVT_SolmanLibrary</name><script><![CDATA[var DVT_SolmanLibrary = Class.create();
DVT_SolmanLibrary.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    sendAlert: function(incNumber, incStatus, incComment, sapClient) {
		var activeLog=gs.getProperty('solman.active.log');
        var requestBody;
        var responseBody;
		var responseSolman='';
        var status;
        var sm;
		var log='SOLMAN\n';
        try {

            sm = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2("DVT- confirm the Solman alert", "zconfirm");
            sm.setStringParameterNoEscape("incident", incNumber);
			sm.setStringParameterNoEscape("status", incStatus);
			sm.setStringParameterNoEscape("comment", incComment);
			sm.setStringParameterNoEscape("sap-client", sapClient);
            sm.setHttpTimeout(10000); //In milliseconds. Wait at most 10 seconds for response from http request.

            response = sm.execute(); //Might throw exception if http connection timed out or some issue with sending request itself because of encryption/decryption of password.
            //responseBody = response.haveError() ? response.getErrorMessage() : response.getBody();
			if(response.haveError()){
				responseBody=response.getErrorMessage()+"\n"+ response.getBody();
				responseSolman=responseBody;
			}else{
				responseBody= response.getBody();
			}
            status = response.getStatusCode();
        } catch (ex) {            
			responseBody = ex.getMessage();
            status = '500';
			responseSolman=responseBody;
        } finally {
            requestBody = sm ? sm.getRequestBody() : null;
        }
		log+='Request Body: ' + requestBody+'\n';
		log+='Response: ' + responseBody+'\n';
		log+='HTTP Status: ' + status+'\n';

		if(activeLog=='true'){
			gs.info(log);
		}	

		return responseSolman;	
       
    },

    type: 'DVT_SolmanLibrary'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>DevDevoteam4</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-25 16:46:23</sys_created_on><sys_id>78d56a8047040250676de567436d43b9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DVT_SolmanLibrary</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_78d56a8047040250676de567436d43b9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>DevDevoteam4</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-03-05 03:39:49</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_fc5466cc47c00250676de567436d43fe

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script table="incident">contact_type=integration^category=monitoreo^subcategoryINocc-aplicacion,occ-base de datos,occ-Integracion,occ-jobs_finanzas,occ-jobs_tecsalud,occ-jobs_tyc,occ-rendimiento,occ-wf_ipc_failed,occ-wf_ipc_rating^business_service.nameINInform치tica Power Center,SAP Basis,SAP DB,SAP ECC Tec Salud,SAP S/4 HANA,SAP HCM^stateCHANGESTO6^EQ<item display_value="Integration" endquery="false" field="contact_type" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="integration"/><item display_value="Monitor" endquery="false" field="category" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="monitoreo"/><item display_value="occ-aplicacion,occ-base de datos,occ-Integracion,occ-jobs_finanzas,occ-jobs_tecsalud,occ-jobs_tyc,occ-rendimiento,occ-wf_ipc_failed,occ-wf_ipc_rating" endquery="false" field="subcategory" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="IN" or="false" value="occ-aplicacion,occ-base de datos,occ-Integracion,occ-jobs_finanzas,occ-jobs_tecsalud,occ-jobs_tyc,occ-rendimiento,occ-wf_ipc_failed,occ-wf_ipc_rating"/><item endquery="false" field="business_service.name" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="IN" or="false" value="Inform치tica Power Center,SAP Basis,SAP DB,SAP ECC Tec Salud,SAP S/4 HANA,SAP HCM"/><item display_value="Resolved" endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESTO" or="false" value="6"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>HBR-Solman Conecction</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var lib = new global.DVT_SolmanLibrary();
	var comment=current.comments.getJournalEntry(1);
	var sapClient=gs.getProperty('solman.sap.client');
	//is state is Resolved or closed
	if(current.state==6||current.state==7)
	{
		comment= current.close_notes;
	}
	var messageSolman=lib.sendAlert(current.number, current.state.getDisplayValue(), comment, sapClient);
	if (messageSolman!=''){
		current.work_notes=messageSolman;
		current.update();
	}
	
	

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>DevDevoteam4</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-25 16:58:59</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>fc5466cc47c00250676de567436d43fe</sys_id><sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count><sys_name>HBR-Solman Conecction</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_fc5466cc47c00250676de567436d43fe</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>DevDevoteam4</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-03-04 23:24:55</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=fc5466cc47c00250676de567436d43fe"/><sys_translated_text action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><documentkey>fc5466cc47c00250676de567436d43fe</documentkey><fieldname>message</fieldname><language>es</language><sys_created_by>DevDevoteam4</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-02-08 19:34:52</sys_created_on><sys_id>d5e517e0971c0a10655570700153af78</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>DevDevoteam4</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-02-08 19:34:52</sys_updated_on><tablename>sys_script</tablename><value/></sys_translated_text></record_update>
